messages.subject: scrapbooking, lapbooks and home/unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I hope it is ok, but I am just so excited. I work with an online scrapbook community and we a rather good sized homeschool/unschool group there. I am going to
messages.messageBody:
I hope it is ok, but I am just so excited. I work with an online scrapbook community and
we a rather good sized homeschool/unschool group there. I am going to have a "Heck No
We Won't Go Back 2 School" chat/crop on Friday, September 5th from 9-11pm. I would
love to have anyone here join us, but wasn't sure if/how I should put this out to everyone.

We are going to have guest speakers (I still have a slot open if anyone here is interested)
and freebies and stuff....so if you want to join us at 3Scrapateers.com just register and in
the referral section put amberlee16 sent you.....then you will be ready to join us for the
HNWWGB2S chat. LOL I just thought it would be fun and I wanted to share with all of you.
Here is all the info below:

It is that time of the year when Homeschooling and Unschooling families watch their
friends and neighbors go back to school. This Crop/Chat event will have ideas on how to
use your digital scrapping supplies, products, layouts to create things you want or need
for your homeschooling.

Ever heard of Lapbooks or Notebooking? Do you use a curriculum or just Unschool? Child-
led? Classical? Come join Veteran homeschooler, Amberlee Batchelor, as she gives ideas,
free lapbooking templates and more at our first "HNWWGB2S" crop.

Date: Friday, September 5th
Time: 9-11 pm Eastern time
Freebies, fun, coupons, ideas, chatting and more! Leah Nieman from CurrClick will join us
from 10:15 to 10:30 to tell us about their amazing website full of options to download for
your homeschool. Be there for our chat and be entered to win a $20 gift certificate for
CurrClick.com I know you will love what they have to offer.


Please email me off list if you have time to speak to our group during the chat and what
you have to offer (blog, website, product, books, etc). Thanks!
